name: Vegan Chiles Rellenos
description: Vegan Chiles Rellenos, filled with cheese and fried until golden and crispy, served on a tomato sauce.

video.name: Vegan Chiles Rellenos
video.description: Vegan chiles rellenos, they are crispy, melty, and spicy, everything a chile relleno should be. They are filled with vegan cheese and lightly fried in a batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Once your poblano chiles are roasted and peeled, using a knife, make a vertical cut from the stem to the tip of the chile.
recipeInstructions.name: Once your poblano chiles are roasted and peeled, using a knife, make a vertical cut from the stem to the tip of the chile.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill with your favorite vegan cheese, close the chile, and secure with toothpicks. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill with your favorite vegan cheese, close the chile, and secure with toothpicks. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Place the tomatoes, garlic, and onion in the blender and process until smooth.
itemListElement.name: Place the tomatoes, garlic, and onion in the blender and process until smooth.

itemListElement.text: Heat a medium sauce pot to medium heat and add the tomato sauce. Simmer for 7 – 10 minutes or until the sauce begins to thicken. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: Heat a medium sauce pot to medium heat and add the tomato sauce. Simmer for 7 – 10 minutes or until the sauce begins to thicken. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Combine the flour, chickpea flour, cornstarch, and salt in a large bowl. Pour in soda water gradually and whisk, until the batter reaches the consistency of a thin pancake batter.
itemListElement.name: Combine the flour, chickpea flour, cornstarch, and salt in a large bowl. Pour in soda water gradually and whisk, until the batter reaches the consistency of a thin pancake batter.

itemListElement.text: Heat three inches of oil in a high sided pan to 360°F. Dip each chile into the batter, letting excess drip off, then place in oil and fry until golden, about 5 minutes on each side.
itemListElement.name: Heat three inches of oil in a high sided pan to 360°F. Dip each chile into the batter, letting excess drip off, then place in oil and fry until golden, about 5 minutes on each side.

itemListElement.text: Remove the chiles and place on a plate lined with paper towels to absorb excess oil.
itemListElement.name: Remove the chiles and place on a plate lined with paper towels to absorb excess oil.

itemListElement.text: Serve the chile on top of a plate of the tomato sauce
itemListElement.name: Serve the chile on top of a plate of the tomato sauce

keywords: chiles rellenos, vegan chiles rellenos, vegan mexican
